Welcome to genopt's documentation!
==================================

.. only:: latex

    .. sidebar:: genopt Python package
        
        ``genopt``: general multi-dimensional optimization


        :Author: Tong Zhang 
        :E-mail: zhangt@frib.msu.edu
        :Copyright: 2016, Facility for Rare Isotope Beams, Michigan State University

..   Install: ``pip install genopt``
..   Github repo: `https://github.com/archman/genopt <https://github.com/archman/genopt>`_
